src:
Mijailovićev odgovor: Poznata beogradska kuhinja opet radi, imate mnogo veći budžet od Partizana
Ekspresna kontra prvog čoveka Partizana

03 Nov 2019

Saopštenje iz Železnika podiglo je veliku prašinu, pošto je FMP nezadovoljan dešavanjima u gradskom derbiju odigranom u dvorani Aleksandar Nikolić juče. 


Saopštenje iz Železnika: Nećemo da ćutimo i mirno posmatramo Partizanov scenario


Imali su određenih zamerki rukovodeći ljudi FMP, ponajviše na atmosferu s tribina, ali u opširnom saopštenju ukazano je na još neke stvari oko kojih, kako je saopšteno, klub neće ćutati. 



U Humskoj 1 nisu želeli da se oglašavaju zvaničnim putem, ali je svoje mišljenje o svemu što je napisano u poruci iz Železnika kratak komentar dao predsednik Partizana Ostoja Mijailović."Poznata beogradska kuhinja ponovo radi pred predstojeći gradski derbi. Nemate razlog za strah, imate mnogo veci budzet od Partizana. Za pobedu ćemo se boriti srcem, na parketu, a ne kroz medijska saopštenja", prokomentarisao je Mijailović na društvenim mrežama. 
Foto: Star Sport
text:
Mijailovic's answer: Well-known Belgrade cuisine works again, you have a much larger budget than Partizan
Partisan Partisan Express

03 Nov 2019

The announcement from Zeleznik raised a lot of dust as FMP was dissatisfied with the events in the city derby played at the Aleksandar Nikolic hall yesterday.


Zeleznik press release: We will not remain silent and calmly observe Partizan's scenario


There were some objections to the FMP's leadership, most notably the atmosphere from the stands, but a comprehensive statement highlighted some other issues that the club would not remain silent about.



In Humska 1 they did not want to be officially announced, but their opinion on everything written in the message from Zeleznik was briefly commented by Partizan President Ostoja Mijailovic. bigger budget than Partizan. We will fight for the victory with our heart, on the floor, not through media announcements, "commented Mijailovic on social networks.
Photo: Star Sport
